title: Qualitative Case Study-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing University Education Quality in South Africa

context.prior_knowledge: University education system knowledge and foundational science concepts
context.additional_context: Analyzing real-world problems in South African higher education and exploring feasible improvements in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Students can analyze at least three factors that hinder educational quality in South African universities through case studies.
Students can draft policy proposals to bridge the gap between domestic and international educational quality benchmarks and field practices.
Students can develop two practical plans to improve teaching methods effectively in resource-constrained environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
